definition: to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: A procedure was carried out for digesting viscera sample with a high pressuredigester.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍高压消解器消化脏器检材的方法。

sentences.english: But the North Koreans know how to deal with a frontal assault.
sentences.chinese: 但是朝鲜人懂得如何消解正面的攻势。

sentences.english: When performing acid digestions, the use of closed vessel digestion or the use of condensers should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 当进行酸消解时，应该考虑采用密闭消解或是冷凝器。

sentences.english: When performing acid digestions, the use of closed vessel digestion or the use of condensers should be considered.
sentences.chinese: 当进行酸消解时，应该考虑采用密闭消解或是冷凝器。

sentences.english: It emphasizes the swordman's social significance and his social value to dispel violence.
sentences.chinese: 通过强调侠客的社会意义和社会价值来消解暴力。

sentences.english: The coreference resolution is an important subtask of information extraction.
sentences.chinese: 共指消解是信息抽取中一个重要子任务。

sentences.english: At least 10 prizes will be awarded and, in addition, honorary mentions.
sentences.chinese: 至少10奖金将被授予荣誉，除此之外，指代消解。

sentences.english: Rhodium was decomposed through microwave digestion and ammonium rhodium hexachloride was dissolved with high purity water.
sentences.chinese: 利用微波消解法溶解铑，超纯水溶解氯铑酸铵。

sentences.english: MayBodhichitta flourish, and dissolve the scourge of ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 愿菩提心常在，消解愚昧之灾难。

sentences.english: Therefore, the absoluteness of meaning is deconstructed and the myth of "faithfulness" is terminated.
sentences.chinese: 这就消解了意义的绝对性，也终结了“忠实”的神话。

sentences.english: The hypostasis of scheduling problem is the process of conflict resolving.
sentences.chinese: 调度问题的本质是对存在的冲突进行消解的过程。

sentences.english: The article holds that health travel is the good prescription to clear up the third state.
sentences.chinese: 本文认为，健康旅游是消解第三状态的良方。

sentences.english: Did dispelling the illusion hurt your work?
sentences.chinese: 消解这些错误观念对你的工作产生负面影响了吗？

sentences.english: Post-modernity transcends modernity by the means of negating and clearing up selfhood.
sentences.chinese: 后现代超越现代性是通过否定和消解主体来实现的。

sentences.english: If liquor samples had serious impurity, microwave resolution method should be adopted firstly.
sentences.chinese: 若杂质比较严重的酒样，宜采取微波消解法。

sentences.english: Chen Ran's awareness beyond sex is dissolves the opposing principles between men and women.
sentences.chinese: 陈染创作的超性别意识是对男女二元对立原则的消解。

definition: (literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
to water down/to play down/to trivialize/to weaken/to become dull with time/to desalinate/desalination
to cause a wound to close up and heal
to mediate/to reconcile/to make peace/to intervene
to dissolve/to resolve (contradictions)/to dispel (doubts)/to iron out (difficulties)/to defuse (conflicts)/to neutralize (fears)
to eliminate/to do away with/to get rid of
